entry.def: Settlers are people who go to live in a new country.

example.ex: The village was founded by settlers from the Volga region.
example.tran: 来自伏尔加地区的移民建起了这个村庄。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who settles in a new colony or moves into new country
3. a clerk in a betting shop who calculates the winnings

Sentence.sentence: Each burning season in the Amazon, fires deliberately set by frontier settlers and developers hurl up almost half a billion metric tons of carbon a year, placing Brazil among the top five contributors to greenhouse gases in the world.
Indians likewise had the traditional life taken from them by white settlers who often encourage them to consume alcohol to prevent them from fighting back.
Why did white settlers introduce alcohol to Indians

sentences.en: The settler got the house at a nominal price.
sentences.cn: 移居者象征性地花点钱买下了这栋房子。
